DOC.brief_summary: The study 's aim provide information clinical business case comprehensive interactive cancer communication system ( ICCS ) context real world use cancer care . This study conduct within Kaiser Permanente Northwest ( KPNW ) healthcare system . Outcomes study include amount ICCS use woman 's rating cancer information competence , perceive social support , emotional well . Secondary outcome include healthcare utilization , cost-effectiveness , clinician rating healthcare visit .
DOC.brief_title: Effectiveness CHESS eHealth Cancer Support Intervention Population-based Care
DOC.criteria: All subject must within 2 month primary breast cancer diagnosis , All subject must least 18 year age Illiterate Homeless
